entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Key Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -22.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Key Lake Airport 2:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -22.9°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -26.5°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
